channel.title: Market reaction on FinanClub

item.title: JOBY
item.description: score:8 Chances: Release of operational and financial results for the second quarter, showcasing progress. Company’s focus on developing all-electric aircraft for commercial passenger service. Submission of Certification Plans to the FAA, marking progress towards aircraft certification. Annual release of Environmental, Social, Governance (ESG) report, highlighting responsible practices.

item.title: SIRI
item.description: score:34 Chances: Sirius XM’s second-quarter 2023 results reflect improvement in average revenue per user amid declining advertising revenues. Sirius XM reported earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended June 2023, which could provide insights into the stock’s future. The company’s dividend payment announcement and trading at a specific price level could attract investor interest.
